author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
How fast do tectonic plates move? Faster than most people think! They're like giant puzzle pieces drifting across the Earth's surface, shaping our planet's landscape over millions of years.

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science #geology
